extracted_playbook.title: Implement a Recovery Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain and retain multiple copies of sensitive or proprietary data and servers in a physically separate, segmented, and secure location (e.g., hard drive, storage device, the cloud).

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce NIST Password Standards
extracted_playbook.description: Require all accounts with password logins to comply with NIST’s standards, using long passwords and considering not requiring recurring password changes.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Multifactor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multifactor authentication for all services, particularly for webmail, virtual private networks, and accounts that access critical systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Systems Updated
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all operating systems, software, and firmware are up to date. Prioritize patching known exploited vulnerabilities in internet-facing systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Segment Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Segment networks to prevent the spread of ransomware by controlling traffic flows and restricting adversary lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Monitoring Tool
extracted_playbook.description: Identify, detect, and investigate abnormal activity and potential ransomware traversal with a network monitoring tool that logs and reports all network traffic.

extracted_playbook.title: Filter Network Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Prevent unknown or untrusted origins from accessing remote services on internal systems to block threat actors from connecting to remote access services.

extracted_playbook.title: Install and Update Antivirus Software
extracted_playbook.description: Install, regularly update, and enable real-time detection for antivirus software on all hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Review for Unrecognized Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Review domain controllers, servers, workstations, and active directories for new and/or unrecognized accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit User Accounts with Administrative Privileges
extracted_playbook.description: Audit user accounts with administrative privileges and configure access controls according to the principle of least privilege.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused ports to reduce potential attack vectors.

extracted_playbook.title: Add Email Banner for External Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Consider adding an email banner to emails received from outside of your organization.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Hyperlinks in Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Disable hyperlinks in received emails to prevent phishing attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Time-Based Access for Admin Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Implement time-based access for accounts set at the admin level and higher, using methods like Just-in-Time (JIT) access.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Command-Line and Scripting Activities
extracted_playbook.description: Disable command-line and scripting activities and permissions to prevent privilege escalation and lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Offline Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain offline backups of data and regularly maintain backup and restoration processes.

extracted_playbook.title: Encrypt and Secure Backup Data
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all backup data is encrypted, immutable, and covers the entire organization’s data infrastructure.

extracted_playbook.title: Regularly Update Backup and Restoration Processes
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly update and maintain backup and restoration processes to ensure data integrity and availability.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Backup Data is Immutable
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure backup data cannot be altered or deleted to protect against data loss.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Backup Data Covers Entire Infrastructure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure backup data covers the entire organization’s data infrastructure to prevent data loss.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Zero Trust Model
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a Zero Trust model to enhance security by verifying every request as though it originates from an open network.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Principle of Least Privilege
extracted_playbook.description: Configure access controls according to the principle of least privilege to minimize potential attack vectors.
